name: Low poly heroes
description:
Seven characters and +30 low poly props of town and dungeon.

Models: from 200 to 400 tris.

Textures: diffuse, normal (512 x 512).

Optimized shaders: bumped, cutoff and scroll.

Rigged, Mixamo ready, no animations.

Enemy with idle, run and stun animations.

📧 Send any suggestion or question to: zuhianteiyu@protonmail.com
